Markov chain Monte Carlo (MCMC) algorithms are not so obvious, apart from the natural approach of generating multiple chains in parallel. Although generation of parallel chains is generally the easiest approach, in cases where burn-in is a serious problem, it is often desirable to use parallelization to speed up generation of a single chain. This article briefly discusses some existing methods for parallelization of MCMC algorithms, and proposes a new â€œpre-fetchingâ€? algorithm to parallelize generation of a single chain.
